description: Named word_delimiter, it splits words into subwords and performs optional transformations on subword groups.

properties.name: generate_word_parts
properties.description: Sets flag causing parts of words to be generated: "PowerShot" => "Power" "Shot".

properties.name: generate_number_parts
properties.description: Sets flag causing number subwords to be generated: "500-42" => "500" "42".

properties.name: catenate_words
properties.description: Sets flag causing maximum runs of word parts to be catenated: "wi-fi" => "wifi".

properties.name: catenate_numbers
properties.description: Sets flag causing maximum runs of number parts to be catenated: "500-42" => "50042".

properties.name: catenate_all
properties.description: Sets flag causing all subword parts to be catenated: "wi-fi-4000" => "wifi4000".

properties.name: split_on_case_change
properties.description: Sets flag causing "PowerShot" to be two tokens; ("Power-Shot" remains two parts regards).

properties.name: preserve_original
properties.description: Sets flag controlling inclusion of original words in subwords: "500-42" => "500" "42" "500-42".

properties.name: split_on_numerics
properties.description: Sets flag causing "j2se" to be three tokens; "j" "2" "se".

properties.name: stem_english_possessive
properties.description: Sets flag causing trailing "'s" to be removed for each subword: "O'Neil's" => "O", "Neil".

properties.name: protected_words
properties.description: Sets a list of words protected from being delimited.

properties.name: protected_words_path
properties.description: Sets a path (either relative to config location, or absolute) to a protected words file configuration.

properties.name: type_table
properties.description: Sets a custom type mapping table.

properties.name: type_table_path
properties.description: Sets a path (either relative to config location, or absolute) to a custom type mapping file configuration.
